org.apache.twill.filesystem

Class FileContextLocationFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.twill.filesystem.FileContextLocationFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocationFactory

    public class FileContextLocationFactory
extends Object
implements LocationFactory
    A LocationFactory implementation that uses FileContext to create Location.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileContextLocationFactory(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration configuration)
      Same as FileContextLocationFactory(configuration, "/").
      FileContextLocationFactory(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration configuration, org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileContext fc, String pathBase)
      Creates a new instance with the given FileContext created from the given Configuration.
      FileContextLocationFactory(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration configuration, String pathBase)
      Creates a new instance.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Location create(String path)
      Creates an instance of Location of the given path.
      Location create(URI uri)
      Creates an instance of Location based on URI uri.
      org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration getConfiguration()
      Returns the Configuration used by this LocationFactory.
      org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileContext getFileContext()
      Returns the FileContext used by this LocationFactory.
      Location getHomeLocation()
      Returns the home location.

        Creates a new instance.

        configuration - the hadoop configuration

        Creates a new instance with the given FileContext created from the given Configuration.
        Parameters:
        configuration - the hadoop configuration
        fc - FileContext instance created from the given configuration
        pathBase - base path for all non-absolute location created through this (@link LocationFactory}.
